features: ARGAN OIL – Harvested from the kernels of the Argan Tree in Morocco, Argan Oil has been used for centuries for its incredible moisturizing and restorative properties. Enriched with Vitamin E and essential fatty acids, Argan Oil helps to protect the skin from free radical damage, helps stimulate collagen production, deeply nourishes + hydrates your skin, and promotes healthy cell turnover, leaving your skin looking smooth, supple, & glowing.

DRYNESS RELIEF – Medix 5.5 Argan Oil + Vitamin E Dryness Relief Body Moisturizer Cream is the perfect choice for anyone looking to improve the overall health and appearance of their skin. Infused with powerful active ingredients like Argan Oil, Shea Butter, Vitamin E, Sacred Lotus, Green Coffee Bean Oil, Aloe Vera, & Fruit Extracts, which all work together to help reduce the look of wrinkles, fine lines, cellulite, sagging skin, & blemishes to promote smooth, firm, and healthy looking skin.

DEEP HYDRATION FOR HEALTHIER SKIN – Infused with Lotus Extract, Aloe Vera, & Coffee Bean Oil for instant hydration to the skin while increasing skin's elasticity + complexion. Lotus Extract contains Vitamin C, Vitamin B complex, & antioxidants that help nourish and brighten your complexion. Coffee Bean extracts cleanse and purify your skin by reducing redness and puffiness while also tightening and exfoliating the skin.

NON-GREASY + ABSORBS EASY – Formulated to be safe for all skin types, including oily skin + sensitive skin. With the many moisturizers, and body lotions that make up your skin care routine, layering on product after product can make your skin feel greasy and smothered. Medix 5.5 unique Argan Oil + Vitamin E Moisturizer formula is lightweight and absorbs easily leaving your skin supple and smooth.

CLEAN BEAUTY – Vegan + Cruelty-Free. Free From: Parabens, Drying Alcohols, Animal-Derived Ingredients, PEGs, Sulfates, Dyes, Propylene Glycol, Mineral Oil, & Talc. Manufactured In Our FDA Inspected Lab in Chicago, USA. Dermatologist-Tested, Clinically-Tested, & Allergy-Tested. We're confident that you'll love the way this Medix 5.5 Argan Oil + Vitamin E Dryness Relief Cream makes your skin look and feel, and we stand behind our product with a satisfaction-guarantee.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Medix 5.5 Retinol + Ferulic Acid Age Rewind Body Cream Medix 5.5 Vitamin C + Turmeric Brighten & Firm Body Cream Medix 5.5 Argan Oil + Vitamin E Dryness Relief Body Cream Medix 5.5 Hyaluronic Acid + Cica Hydrate & Renew Body Cream Medix 5.5 Collagen + Peptides Plump & Lift Body Cream Targets Crepey Skin | Wrinkles | Stretch Marks | Firming | Sagging Skin Extra-Brightening | Dark Spots | Uneven Skintone | Age Spots | Sun Damaged Skin Dimpled Skin | Uneven Skin Tone | Renewed Skin | Rough Texture | Chronic Dry Skin Dry Skin | Wrinkles | Stretch Marks | Scars | Rough Texture | Dehydrated Skin Firming | Tightening | Fine Lines | Wrinkles | Rough Texture | Spider Veins Benefits Seeking bouncy, resilient skin that "Snaps back"? This Retinol cream restores lubricity and cushion to aging skin Say Goodbye to unsightly dark marks and discolorations. Reveal bright, even, supple-looking skin Promotes a smooth, supple appearance. Nourishes dry skin and replenishes moisture Uncover soft, supple, and happier skin. Restores + Replenishes hydration to reveal a fresh new complexion Peptides are like anti-aging messengers. They send signals to your skin to help "Turn on" your own healthy collagen production Clinically-Tested ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Dermatologist-Tested ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Allergy-Tested ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

Gently exfoliate your skin with our Glycolic Acid + Lactic Acid oil cleansing body wash to remove impurities and prepare your cleansed and refreshed skin for all-over hydration. Generously apply your favorite Medix 5.5 body moisturizer cream, crafted from premium ingredients and optimized for natural balance, any time of day. Mix a few pumps of our powerful concentrated booster serums with your favorite body moisturizer, body oil, face cream, foundation, concealer, or facial serum within your palm and rub hands together to combine. Then apply onto cleansed skin focusing on problem areas for extra care where you need it most.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I just got it today, but I'm impressed
reviews.reviewText: I just got the bottle today and I put it on my "crypt keeper" hands. They're very dry and my knuckles always look like they're about to crack. Well, after about 5 hours and only one application they really feel smooth and soft - even after washing them a few times. I read a few people complaining about the scent. It's actually a very light scent and smells kind of sweet like ice cream. I can't wait to try using it on other parts of my body, and hopefully it will help with my old lady neck. Even if it doesn't, I really like how soft it makes my skin feel!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So let me say this..I'm not sure why this was my first time purchasing from this company and trying their products but it's definitely not going to be my last. This combo right here is heaven in a bottle. I'm from the Caribbean and trust me when I say..these products do well with our climate here. The Glycolic Acid was is invigorating, especially since our days are always hot. The lotion is light weight but you still feel it's effectiveness because your skin is so smooth and soft afterwards..not to mention adding a few pumps of the booster to it..and it went to another level of moisture on my skin. I'll be a customer forever! Try these products y'all..they're magnificent 👌🏾😌

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not for people sensitive to smells or scents.
reviews.reviewText: Liked the product and felt it working right away. Unfortunately, the scent is overpowering and does not dissipate over time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: After only a few days using this retinol body lotion I am in love. The scent is a bit strong when you first put it on, but doesn’t bother me after a few minutes. The body lotion leaves my skin feeling soft and hydrated without a sticky residue. I have seen improvement in my skins texture in just a few days. I can’t wait to see what the long term results will be. I will report back after a summer of use here in Arizona.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Smells so bad 😭
reviews.reviewText: This vitamin C and tumeric lotion STINKS. I know it’s kind of crazy to complain about when it’s turmeric, but it’s really so bad. However, if I pretend it doesn’t smell so terrible, so far I like it. Very hydrating and soaks in with no residual residue. Hopefully I can tolerate the scent long enough to see if it works to lighten dark spots ( the reason I purchased this was to lighten the dark skin patches on my thighs) I will update this review in time and let you guys know how it goes. The scent does get a little bit better when it dries and isn’t as overpowering as when just applied… but it still lasts and smells terrible. If it lightens the dark spots I won’t be mad at it anymore. Will definitely be back with an update.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am obsessed with this entire line of lotions!!!Because the reviews for all the different types are together I’m going to highlight them all here as I have tried and loved every single one of them.For background on me. I’m 60 but take good care of myself and people usually think I’m 10-15 years younger than I am. I do have some age “tells” though that if you look closely would give my age away. And these lotions are making those go away. I have spent tons of money over the years and am a product junkie and I’ve never found anything that works better on my face - yes my face(!) or my body than Medix 5.5 lotions.Collagen and Peptides lotion is the one that started my love affair with this brand. All the lotions are loaded with dimethicone which fills in all the lines and plumps skin and it is amazing. Spackle for skin. Anyway after just a few days my reasonably deep forehead lines (age tell) are way less deep. Noticeably. I’ve taken such good care of myself I don’t expect to turn back the clock at all - I’m happy just slowing it down - but those lines are better. Also my skin is baby butt smooth and any alligator lines are gone. There isn’t really a smell aside from the normal lotion smell. This stuff is amazing!! Do not be afraid to use these on your face. The ingredients are safe, gentle and effective.I tried the retinol lotion. Now I’m actually very allergic to retinol but I’ve only used it on my face and I figured in a body lotion surely it’s not too strong. Well I put it on my body at night (retinol and sunlight don’t mix and I’m a Florida girl) and woke up needing a benedryl. There’s a good amount of retinol in there. Lol. No bad smell and I wish I could use this on my face but I do skim it on my legs lightly once a week or so.Hyaluronic acid and cica extract. Ok watch out for this one. This smells strongly of rose. And it doesn’t go away. I love hyaluronic acid to hold in hydration but the smell is way too strong for me. Medix has a booster that has no odor and can be mixed in and I prefer that. I am using this up by applying it before I shower and then rubbing it in with the water and showering as usual. But this one I’ll probably pass on next time.Argan oil and Vitamin E is another solid basic lotion. Smells like lotion and hydrates well. This one is also great.Vitamin C and Turmeric is a great lotion but it does smell strongly and body spray doesn’t cover the smell. But it works like it should so I will keep using this one (only at night because Vitamin C and sunshine don’t mix either). So this one has helped a lot with my brown spots on my hands and chest (another tell). I haven’t used it too much out of love for my husband sleeping next to me but I can see a difference.Coconut oil and manuka honey - this one smells fabulous! Like the best coconut tropical suntan lotion but it’s not overpowering and sadly it fades quickly. The lotion is good just like all of them although I don’t think it makes as big an impact as some of the others.Hope this helps. I cannot say enough good things about these lotion!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I feel like this makes a difference!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the dark pink retinol lotion to help with crepey skin on my stomach after losing 103 pounds. (Don't get fat kids, lol.) It drastically reduced how wrinkly my stomach looks in like a week and a half. I have also ordered the Argan in the orange bottle to try. These lotions absorb nicely without leaving a feeling of residue. The smell doesn't bother me either. This won't get rid of my excess skin, but it definitely makes it look firmer and less ugly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I started using the retinol on my face and neck every morning. Every winter I get extremely dry flaky skin because it is so dry and cold here. I love how my face is glowing and my skin, soft and smooth. No dryness or flaky skin this winter. My husband says I am looking younger, the only thing I am doing different is using this lotion in the morning. Also, I love the smell, some reviews didn't like it but it is very mild and pleasant in my opinion.
La marca es calidad, la uso para el cuerpo
La crema no es barata, pero el resultado es muy bueno
Excelente producto me deja suave la piel del cuerpo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: At last something that works on creepy skin. After a lot of different creams etc this one works.Used it twice a day for first week then at least once a day thereafter it feels really nice on the skin and any stickiness’s goes of very quickly only been applying it to arms at firstnow going to use on legs and neck etc.This is not as expensive as other products I have used so was unsure about buying it after several failures this is worth every penny.

reviews.reviewTitle: Medix 5.5 Vitamin-C-Creme mit Kurkuma für Gesicht und Körper,
